-Hi. -Hey, Walt.
Hi.
I'll be right out. We can hang out.
translation.zh: 我马上出来 我们可以聊天

translation.en: -Hi. Is Walt here? -No.
I'd like you to come to my house.
-Isn't it Mom's night? -Yeah, but I'd like you to come over.
translation.zh: -今天不是跟妈住吗？ -对 但我要你过来

translation.en: I have to put on my shoes.
Come in, I guess.
-Place looks different. -She got some new furniture in Maine.
translation.zh: -家里看起来不一样 -她在缅因州买了新家具

translation.en: That was my TV. I bought that TV.
translation.zh: 那是我的电视 我买的

translation.en: That's my Jude the Obscure.
-Wanna take it? -No.
She still has some of the books you wrote.
Dad, why are you taking me to your house on Mom's night?
translation.zh: 爸 干嘛带我去你家？

translation.en: Just a minute.
-Oh. -Hi.
Frank let me in. I didn't realize you were here.
translation.zh: 法兰克让我进来的 我不知道你在

translation.en: -I'm here. It's Monday. -I'd like to take him for just tonight.
translation.zh: -我在 今天星期一 -今晚我想带他回去

translation.en: I'll give you two Thursdays in a row or something.
translation.zh: 我会连续两个周四让给你

translation.en: -Mom. -It's my night. He wants to stay.
translation.zh: -妈 -今晚轮到我 他要留下来

translation.en: Be careful. That's an antique.
-Where's Walt? -I don't know where Walt is.
He's not up there. Bernard!
He doesn't come here.
You should go. You'll see him tomorrow.
translation.zh: 你该走了 明天你会见到他

translation.en: Tell Walt to call me.
I dunked my head in that pond in the park.
translation.zh: 我把头泡在公园池塘里

translation.en: The one near the zoo? Oh, sweetie, that's filthy.
translation.zh: 动物园附近那个？ 甜心 那里好脏

translation.en: I hope you didn't drink any of it.
Some may have gotten in my mouth. I tried not to swallow.
translation.zh: 有些可能进了嘴巴 我尽量不吞下去

translation.en: I shouldn't have broken up with Sophie.
-Why did you? -I thought I could do better.
translation.zh: -那为什么分？ -我以为可以找到更好的

translation.en: Better how?
I don't know.
That's good. You miss her.
But I don't see myself as a person who is in this situation. I just don't.
translation.zh: 我没想到自己会变成这样子

translation.en: I don't see myself this way.
translation.zh: 我认为自己不是这种人

translation.en: Well, this is how it is.
Did you ever love Dad?
Because if you didn't, why did you ever marry him?
translation.zh: 如果没有 为何嫁给他？

translation.en: If you were gonna leave, why put us through this?
translation.zh: 如果你要离开 为何把我们扯进来？

translation.en: It wasn't planned. When we first met, he was unlike anyone.
translation.zh: 我也没想过会这样 我们认识时 他独一无二

translation.en: In Columbus, there was no one like your dad.
translation.zh: 你爸在哥伦布市与众不同

translation.en: I had had an affair with a man before your father.
translation.zh: 在你爸之前 我跟一个男人交往过

translation.en: He worked at the college bookstore. We made love in the stockroom.
translation.zh: 他在书店上班 我们在库房里做爱

translation.en: Mom, I don't wanna hear about your affairs, please.
translation.zh: 我不想听你的风流韵事 拜托

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I don't know what I can say to you.
translation.zh: 我不知道能对你说什么

translation.en: You say things in a way that I don't wanna hear them.
translation.zh: 你说话的方式让我不想听

translation.en: I know, Chicken.
It's something I do. It's a bad habit.
Do you remember when we watched Robin Hood?
translation.zh: 记得以前一起看《罗宾汉》吗？

translation.en: -He knocked on my window. -Bernard, what are you doing?
translation.zh: -他敲我的窗户 -柏纳 你干什么？

translation.en: Joan, let me ask you something.
The work I did at the end of our marriage...
translation.zh: 我在婚姻后期所做的努力

translation.en: ...making dinners, being attentive. It never was gonna make a difference.
translation.zh: 做晚餐 专业做家务 根本是徒劳无功

translation.en: -You were leaving. -You never made a dinner.
translation.zh: -怎样你都会离开 -你从没做过晚餐

translation.en: I made burgers when you had pneumonia.
translation.zh: 你得肺炎时我做过汉堡

translation.en: -Only after I insisted. -If I had made more dinners...
translation.zh: -我坚持你才做 -如果我多做几次晚餐

translation.en: -...would that have made a difference? -I was ready to leave long ago.
translation.zh: -会有差别吗？ -我很久以前就准备离开了

translation.en: I just didn't know it then.
I've been giving it some thought. You called my father at the last minute.
translation.zh: 我仔细想过了 你在最后一刻打给我爸

translation.en: Whatever you said, he thought I could save the marriage.
translation.zh: 不管你说了什么 他认为我可以拯救婚姻

translation.en: You felt I wasn't aggressive enough. I'll make more of an effort to do stuff.
translation.zh: 你觉得我不够积极 我会更努力做家事

translation.en: I've been cooking and doing chores at my house.
translation.zh: 最近我在家里煮饭做家事

translation.en: I make veal cutlets, which the boys love.
Why don't we all have dinner and talk more about this?
translation.zh: 我们何不一起吃晚餐 多谈谈这件事？

translation.en: I'm sorry.
It's just...
Burgers.
I'll sue you, Joan. You know I will.
translation.zh: 我会去告你 你知道我会的

translation.en: You had an affair for four years with that fucking shrink...
translation.zh: 你和破坏我们婚姻的心理医生 搞外遇四年

translation.en: ...that ruined our marriage. I can get the kids.
translation.zh: 我可以得到孩子的监护权

translation.en: I talked to Eddie Goodman who works on these cases.
translation.zh: 艾迪古曼擅长这种案子

translation.en: I have an open-and-shut case.
-Frank, Walt, get in the car. -Sue me?
translation.zh: -法兰克 华特 上车 -告我？

translation.en: That's-- I can't--
You only wanted joint custody because you pay less child support that way.
translation.zh: 你只想要共同监护权 因为那样对孩子责任比较少

translation.en: Because it's cheaper for you.
Walt, Frank!
-I don't wanna go. -I don't give a shit! Get in the car.
translation.zh: -我不想去 -我不管 上车 法兰克 上车

translation.en: -Frank! -Let him stay. Let him stay.
translation.zh: -法兰克 -让他留下 让他留下

translation.en: -I'm just asking this one thing. -He wants to stay.
translation.zh: -我只要求这一件事 -他想留下来

translation.en: -Let him. I'll go. -Fine.
Hold on.
You want him tonight?
Okay. Thanks.
That's all right, my brother.
The cat!
I got him. Joan, I got him.
I got him.
Goddamn it.
-Dad! You see him go--? -I'm moving it!
translation.zh: -爸 他跑掉了 -我马上开走

translation.en: Fuck off.
Whoa, Bernard! You all right?
-I had him. -Joan, call an ambulance!
translation.zh: -我抓到他了 -琼 叫救护车

translation.en: Walt, get in the car.
What?
It means "bitch." Don't you remember?
translation.zh: 这是“婊子”的意思 不记得吗？

translation.en: You're calling me a bitch?
No, don't you remember the last line of Godard's A bout de souffle?
translation.zh: 不 你不记得高达的《断了气》 最后一句台词吗？

translation.en: Belmondo calls Seberg a bitch.
translation.zh: 杨波贝蒙叫珍西宝婊子

translation.en: We saw it at the Thalia with the Dicksteins.
translation.zh: 我们和狄家人在泰拉戏院看的

translation.en: I got you in for the children's price. You were pregnant with Walt.
translation.zh: 我让你用半票进场 当时你怀着华特

translation.en: Like six weeks.
I still got you in for a children's ticket.
translation.zh: 我还是让你用半票混进场

translation.en: You told me you didn't like Godard. You thought the jump cuts were--
translation.zh: 你说不喜欢高达 觉得跳接…

translation.en: I'd check for the cat behind the ashcans...
-... under the Golodners' stoop! -Okay.
PARAMEDIC CITY OF NEW YORK
I didn't write it.
-I know. -Pink Floyd did.
translation.zh: -我知道 -是平克弗洛伊德乐队写的

translation.en: Do you think we'll find him?
translation.zh: 你觉得我们会找到它吗？

translation.en: I hope so.
Do you think one day we could go to the Galapagos?
translation.zh: 我们会去加科隆群岛吗？

translation.en: I don't know, Pickle.
Ivan and I could take you to the country on Saturday to see real turtles.
translation.zh: 艾文和我周六可以 带你去乡下看真的乌龟

translation.en: Saturday is Dad's day.
translation.zh: 星期六我要跟爸在一起

translation.en: -There's my son. -Hey.
-Are you okay? -I'm fine.
Thought it was a heart attack, but I think I'm just exhausted.
translation.zh: 本来以为是心脏病发作 但应该只是太累了

translation.en: Doctor said I'm exhausted.
-Too many veal cutlets? -Maybe.
That a good book?
Oh, this is pulp. It's not serious.
translation.zh: 廉价小说 不是严肃的东西

translation.en: It's hard to read a good book in the hospital, but this isn't bad of its kind.
translation.zh: 在医院很难读好书 不过这本算不错

translation.en: Leonard is the fillet of the crime genre.
translation.zh: 伦纳德的犯罪小说算顶尖的

translation.en: I'd like you to stay here for the day. I need the company.
translation.zh: 今天留在这里吧 我要有人陪

translation.en: Okay.
Lili moved out.
Do me a favor, go out in the hall, get me another pillow.
translation.zh: 帮个忙 到走廊再拿个枕头

translation.en: My neck is hurting.
Maybe we could even things out, and I could stay at Mom's a few nights.
translation.zh: 我们可以平衡一下 我在妈家多住几晚

translation.en: -I've been staying more at yours. -It's not a good time.
translation.zh: -我在你家多住好几天了 -现在不方便

translation.en: I'm not gonna be 100 percent for a while. I'd like you around.
translation.zh: 还要一阵子才会康复 我希望你在身边

translation.en: -I don't wanna come for a while. -It's not up to you.
translation.zh: -我有一阵子不想来 -由不得你

translation.en: You're a minor. You're in my custody. My home is your home too.
translation.zh: 你未成年 我是监护人 我家也是你家

translation.en: I'm not coming.
Why?
That hurts my feelings.
Don't be difficult.
If you like, we can get you some more posters, make your room better.
translation.zh: 我们可以多买些海报 让你房间好看点

translation.en: Paint it a different color.
I can lend you my first edition of The Naked and the Dead.
translation.zh: 我可以把初版的《裸者与死者》 借给你

translation.en: As a present.
Let me get you a pillow.
You used to be very emotional when you were younger.
Did I look pretty silly out there, falling on the concrete?
translation.zh: 我倒在地上的样子很蠢吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
What? What are you laughing at?
That was funny how you said, "Yeah."
-Good comic timing. -Thanks.
Why don't we get some breakfast.
See if you can find a nurse out there.
Try to get the blond. She looks like a young Monica Vitti.
translation.zh: 找那个金发的 她很像年轻时的莫尼卡维蒂

translation.en: Oh, excuse me.
The man in that room wants to order some breakfast.
translation.zh: 那间房的病人要点早餐

translation.en: Okay.
